com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps

Class TypeStep<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.AbstractStep<java.util.function.Consumer<T>>
      • com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.TypeStep<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the test data.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Statusable

    public class TypeStep<T>
extends AbstractStep<java.util.function.Consumer<T>>
    Describes a BDD Step with a test datum.
    To execute it, see the AbstractStep.test() method.
    Author:
    ckeiner

      • TypeStep

        public TypeStep(com.aventstack.extentreports.GherkinKeyword keyword,
                java.lang.String description,
                java.util.function.Consumer<T> behavior)
        Creates a TypeStep with the specified keyword, description, behavior but without test data.
        Parameters:
        keyword - The GherkinKeyword of the step.
        description - A String describing what this step does.
        behavior - A consumer containing the behavior.
        See Also:
        AbstractStep.AbstractStep(GherkinKeyword, String, Object), GherkinKeyword

      • TypeStep

        public TypeStep(com.aventstack.extentreports.GherkinKeyword keyword,
                java.lang.String description,
                java.util.function.Consumer<T> behavior,
                T testdata)
        Creates a TypeStep with the specified keyword, description, behavior but without test data.
        Parameters:
        keyword - The GherkinKeyword of the step.
        description - A String describing what this step does.
        behavior - A consumer containing the behavior.
        testdata - The test data for this step.
        See Also:
        AbstractStep.AbstractStep(GherkinKeyword, String, Object), GherkinKeyword
